name: Duwel - Space Shooter
description:
Duwel (derived from Duel)  is a minimalistic space shooter game that can be played by two players connected to the same PC.  Duwel can be played using a Keyboard for Player 1 and a Joystick or Controller for Player 2. 

Controls are as follows :

ActionPlayer 1Player 2Move aroundW, A, S, DLeft StickAimLeft, Right ArrowsRight StickShootSpace barRTChoose Powerup1,2,3 (over alphanumerics)Y, B, A (1,2,3)Activate Power upFLBConfirmELT

The main objective of the game is to kill the other player first. The health bars are shown in the upper left (for Player 1) and upper right (for Player 2) corners. Powerups are shown in the lower left (for Player 1) and lower right (for Player 2) corners. 

There are 3 powerups, 

  1. Health Regeneration (Medkit)
  2. Guard (Stops damage from front attacks)
  3. Invisibility (90% invisibility)

The game is still in development, just posted here to see your idea of the game. The game can be improved a lot in many ways. For an example, I could put more powerups and more types of NPCs instead of the only type available (Chasers).
